aka: A Town Called Panic: The Christmas Log
awards:
第27届欧洲电影奖(2014)
　　最佳短片(提名)

writer.name: 文森特·帕塔尔 Vincent Patar
斯特凡·奥比尔 Stéphane Aubier

director.name: 文森特·帕塔尔 Vincent Patar
斯特凡·奥比尔 Stéphane Aubier

this_title: Panique au village: La bûche de Noël
trans_title: A Town Called Panic: The Christmas Log
introduction: The year's end celebrations are coming. Christmas : the tree, the dinner, the presents. Indian and Cowboy are expecting their presents eagerly. Overexcited by the organization of the celebration, they fight and destroy the Yule log on which Horse was putting the last touch. Horse is livid and cancels the gifts from Santa Claus. How will they win back the favors of Horse and The Old Bearded Man? How will they retrieve their gifts ? For Indian and Cowboy begins a long, very long Christmas Eve...
foreign_title: Panique au village: La bûche de Noël
